title: Spanish Comprehensible Input | Students Create Story on Zoom

media:group.media:title: Spanish Comprehensible Input | Students Create Story on Zoom
media:group.media:description:
A Spanish 1 class participates in their first Comprehensible Input story (One Word Image) a few weeks into the school year. Students participate via Zoom during remote learning. One student draws the object from our story, which is revealed at the end of the video.
